Name: John Kitchen
Job/Team Function: To provide effective tactical direction of the Corporate Services Division and strategic advice to the Director General on operational matters; effective linkage with other parts of the Museum, effective co-ordination of all activities within the Division and the efficient use of all resources and staff to provide maximum value for money. Reports to the Director General, Royal Air Force Museum.

Name: Peter Dye
Job/Team Function: The Director General is responsible for the efficient management of the Royal Air Force Museum, it's staff, services, collections and financial and other resources. Reports to the Board of Trustees, Royal Air Force Museum.

Name: Keith Ifould
Job/Team Function: Management of the Commercial Services Division with personal responsibility for the Museums Fundraising programme, PR and media, visitor development, marketing, retail and corporate events. Reports to the Director General, Royal Air Force Museum.
